function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Dependence on accurate data collection and reporting","Impact":"Inaccurate data may lead to improper response and resource allocation","Mitigation":"Implement data verification and validation processes","Technologies":"Data verification algorithms, blockchain technology","People":"Public-health agencies, governments, healthcare organizations","Owner":"Data collection and reporting agencies"},{"Description":"Privacy and security risks of big data usage","Impact":"Potential unauthorized access to sensitive health data","Mitigation":"Implement strong data encryption and access control measures","Technologies":"Encryption technologies, access control systems","People":"Data scientists, big data analysts","Owner":"Healthcare policymakers, data management teams"},{"Description":"Misuse of modeling studies for misinformation","Impact":"Misleading guidance for public health planning and control","Mitigation":"Peer review, validation of modeling methods and assumptions","Technologies":"Validation algorithms, peer review platforms","People":"Public-health authorities, health policymakers","Owner":"Modeling study researchers"}]}
